class.name: LuaParser
class.description: Internally LuaParser uses [url=https://tree-sitter.github.io/tree-sitter/]Tree Sitter[/url] with the [url=https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-lua]tree-sitter-lua[/url] grammar.

method.name: parse_code
method.description: Parse Lua code into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST). If [param code] has any errors, a valid AST containing the errors will be returned. Use [method LuaAST.has_errors] to check for errors.

members.member: Toggle whether Tree Sitter logs debugging messages while parsing.
